original_text: Now I want to say this to you before I finish my letter. All of you should agree with each other in what you think. You should try to understand how other people are feeling. Love each other as brothers and sisters. Be kind to each other. Do not think that you are more important than other people.
korean_text: 마지막으로 말하노니 너희가 다 마음을 같이하여 동정하며 형제를 사랑하며 불쌍히 여기며 겸손하며

sentences.original_text: Now I want to say this to you
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 내가 너희에게 이 말을 하고 싶다

sentences.original_text: All of you should agree with each other
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 모두는 서로 의견이 일치해야 한다

sentences.original_text: Love each other as brothers and sisters
Do not think that you are more important
